thread.title: Wind farm works to reduce eagle deaths from old turbines PBS NewsHour
thread.title_full: Video: Wind farm works to reduce eagle deaths from old turbines | Watch PBS NewsHour Online | PBS Video

author: pbs.org
title: Wind farm works to reduce eagle deaths from old turbines PBS NewsHour
text: The Altamont Pass, east of San Francisco, is home to hundreds of bird species, as well as to 3,000 wind energy turbines. That's a deadly combination, especially for golden eagles. Special correspondent Scott Shafer and producer Gabriela Quir√≥s of KQED report on a strategy to help save protected species.
